title: Raster
content:
I've historically had problems with pixel font families offering regular, bold, and italics. Too often, they look like three separate faces to me. I have seen a few though, that in my opinion really succeed.   
   
So I'm trying to play with a bold and regular version of a new face I'll call Raster for now. My question here is, how successfull ar the two as a family? For the most part, it works for me, but I'm not sure over all.   
   
The regular version looks a little too wide--fat even, compared to the bold. In fact, the x-height looks higher in the regular version too.   
   
Any suggestions?
